## 272. BONE
### Definition
General term for human and animal bones (anatomical, not as part of food). Not to be confused with specific designations of various bones (like ‘rib’, ‘vertebra’) and a possible designation of ‘tubular bone in general’. (GLD)

### Contexts
1. The body consists of flesh, blood and bones. 2. He was sucking marrow out of a bone. 3. He choked on a bone.
